articles.title: National Meeting Marks Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place with splendor at Kim Il Sung Stadium here Saturday to celebrate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there was Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, who is supreme leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Also present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairpersons of friendly parties, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons of KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, heroes, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, those related to the revolutionary activities of the President, persons of merit, working people in Pyongyang, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of various countries, representatives of international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here, those who attended the World Congress on the Juche idea and other foreign guests.
					
					  Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK, delivered a report.
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung was the most outstanding leader of the revolution whom the Korean people acclaimed for the first time in the nation's history spanning thousands of years, a peerlessly great man and a great sage of mankind, the reporter said, referring to the exploits performed by him.
					
					 The reporter went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung built socialism centered on the popular masses, setting a worldwide example in the revolution and construction.
					
					 He embraced all people by pursuing noble benevolent and all-embracing politics, sparing nothing for the people, and showed profound loving care for them. 
					
					 He put forth fair, aboveboard and reasonable reunification proposals including the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 10-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and provided a new program for achieving great national unity, escalating the movement for national reunification into a nationwide movement.
					
					 He set forth outstanding ideas, strategies and tactics on global independence and made an undying contribution to the socialist movement, the unity and solidarity of the non-aligned movement and the development of friendly and cooperative relations with those countries aspiring after independence.
					
					 His idea and cause were steadfastly carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who wisely led the sacred struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche as the dearest comrade and comrade-in-arms most loyal to him.
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the army and people of the DPRK to rise up during the Arduous March, forced march when the destiny of the country and the nation stood at crossroads and took the lead in the drive for weathering such stern ordeals that might have forced others to collapse a hundred times, paving a wide avenue for prosperity.
					
					 He formulated the independent line and proposals for reunification laid out by the President as the three charters for national reunification and ushered in the June 15 era of reunification in which the nation advances in the idea of "By our nation itself", thus bringing about a landmark phase of national reunification.
					
					 He made a great contribution to advancing the socialist movement, achieving peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism with his superb diplomatic strategy and energetic external activities.
					
					 The reporter stressed that the army and people of the DPRK are full of conviction in sure victory and optimism and the future of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea is immensely rosy and bright as they have Kim Jong Un, a peerlessly illustrious commander, at the helm of the Party and the revolution. 
					
					 Similar meetings took place in all provinces, cities, counties and industrial complexes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Issues Order on Promoting Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Issues Order on Promoting Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on Friday issued Order No. 009 on promoting the military ranks of KPA commanding officers.
					 He said that the Korean revolutionary armed forces which President Kim Il Sung founded and led along the road of victory and glory and General Secretary Kim Jong Il developed into the matchless army of Mt. Paektu have performed great exploits for the party, revolution, country and its people while carrying forward the glorious tradition of devotedly defending the leader for 80 years and are now fully demonstrating their tremendous might as a strong army in the defence of the country and the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 He issued the order to promote the military ranks of KPA commanding officers who have grown up as the backbone of the revolutionary forces under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea and leaders, on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung. He also expressed belief that they would creditably discharge their duties as vanguard fighters of the Songun revolution in the sacred struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 According to the order, Pak Sun Hwan has been promoted to Lieut. General, Kim Yong Hwa, Son Kyong Bok and 68 others to Maj. General.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreigners
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with foreign guests at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday. They included Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who doubles as secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party, Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, and his party and delegations and delegates of the groups for the study of the Juche idea from different countries and regions. They attended the World Congress on the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Bangladeshi Guests
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Bangladeshi Guests
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Saturday met and conversed with guests from Bangladesh. They were Ghazi Zafar Ahmed, former prime minister, a delegation of the National Preparatory Committee for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung led by its Chairman Rashed Khan Menon who is chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party, and Garib Newaz, president of the People's League who doubles as chairman of the Self-Reliance Research Centre of Bangladesh, on their visit to the DPRK.
					 They asked Choe Thae Bok to convey their warm congratulations to the dear respected Kim Jong Un upon his election as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il, successor to the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung, enforced the Songun politics, turning the DPRK into a socialist bulwark, they said.
					
					 They noted that they would boost interchange with the WPK and extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Ki Nam Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Ki Nam Meets Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, had a talk with the delegation of the China Foreign Languages Press Publishing and Distribution Administration led by its Director Zhou Mingwei at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.
					 Zhou extended warm congratulations to the dear respected Kim Jong Un upon his election as first secretary of the WPK at the Party Conference.
					
					 He expressed belief that the traditional Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation would steadily grow stronger.

articles.title: Banquet Given for Participants in World Congress on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Banquet Given for Participants in World Congress on Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government hosted a banquet at the People's Palace of Culture Saturday for the participants in the World Congress on the Juche Idea on the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present on invitation at the banquet were Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) who doubles as secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, and other participants in the congress.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who doubles as chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam said in his speech that the world congress was a great political festival which called back with deep emotion the exploits of Kim Il Sung and strikingly demonstrated the validity and vitality of the Juche idea to the whole world once again.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and enriched and developed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il shines as great guiding idea of the era of independence thanks the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He wished the adherents to the Juche idea making efforts to build a new independent world and extending support and encouragement to the Korean people's just cause greater success in their work.
					
					 Vishwanath, in his speech said:
					
					 The successful holding of the World Congress on the Juche Idea is a token of boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The great President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il still lead the vigorous advance of the cause of independence upon Juche orbit, by illuminating the way ahead of the Juche idea followers.
					
					 The continuity and completion of the Juche revolutionary cause, the people's cause of independence, is firmly guaranteed now by respected H.E. Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Order and Medal Awarded to Followers of Juche Idea
articles.content:
DPRK Order and Medal Awarded to Followers of Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK order and medal were conferred on Juche idea followers.
					 Order of DPRK Friendship 2nd Class was awarded to Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Jairo Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, and Vadim Kudimin, chairman of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works. Friendship Medal was also awarded to 14 followers of the Juche idea. 
					
					 They have conducted brisk activities to study and disseminate the Juche idea.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.

articles.title: Materials Donated by Chinese Organizations
articles.content:
Materials Donated by Chinese Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Materials were donated by the visiting delegation of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries and the China-Korea Friendship Association for the work to preserve with best care the area around the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 A donating ceremony took place on Saturday.
					
					 Prior to it, members of the delegation laid a floral basket before the statues before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were members of the delegation headed by Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 A certificate of donation was conveyed at the end of the speeches.

articles.title: DPRK, Vietnam Sign 2012-2014 Plan for Cultural Exchange
articles.content:
DPRK, Vietnam Sign 2012-2014 Plan for Cultural Exchange 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The 2012-2014 plan for cultural exchange between the DPRK Ministry of Culture and the Vietnamese Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism was signed with due ceremony here Saturday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, and officials concerned and from the Vietnamese side the delegation of the government cultural delegation headed by Ho Anh Tuan, vice-minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, and Nguyen Dinh Duong, minister counselor of the Vietnamese embassy here.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting of Foreign Crewmen Held
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting of Foreign Crewmen Held
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Nampho Port on Saturday, a day before the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statue of the President in Nampho City and made bows.
					
					 Present at the meeting were captains and crewmen of the Belize-flagged ship "Tousyoumaru", a Cambodian-flagged ship and a Panamanian-flagged ship.
					
					 The speakers said that the birth of Kim Il Sung was a historic event that brought the bright future to the Korean people and the world revolutionary people.
					
					 They noted that Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, defeated briganish Japanese imperialism and devoted his all to the liberation and independence of Korea and the prosperity of the country.
					
					 The great feats he performed for the era and history will be everlasting, they stressed. 
					
					 They wished the Korean people greater successes in achieving the reunification of the country and building a thriving nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Choir Sons of Jubal of U.S. Arrives in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Choir Sons of Jubal of U.S. Arrives in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Choir Sons of Jubal of the United States arrived here on Saturday to take part in the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Visits Birthplace of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Visits Birthplace of Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A Russian cultural delegation led by Alexandr Avdeyev, minister of Culture of the Russian Federation, visited Mangyongdae on Saturday. 
					 The members of the delegation looked round the historic relics being briefed on the undying revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and the members of his patriotic and revolutionary family. 
					
					 They had a photo taken in honor of their visit to the old home in Mangyongdae before going round the revolutionary historic sites on Mangyong Hill.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Festival Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Festival Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of different countries, regions and international organizations taking part in the international festival for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung Saturday visited the venue of the 14th Kimilsungia Festival.
					 They looked round potted Kimilsungias with deep emotion, being briefed on the immortal flower in full bloom. 
					
					 At the end of the visit, Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia and chairman of the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, said that Kimilsungia, an immortal flower presented to President Kim Il Sung by President Soekarno in humble reverence for him, is in full bloom worldwide.
					
					 After looking round the venue of the festival, George Burchett, son of Australian writer and journalist Wilfred Burchett, said he was struck with admiration to visit the festival. 
					
					 Nada Takashi, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, said that he came to clearly realize what a great man the President was while seeing Kimilsungias.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army of the DPRK, on April 8 received a congratulatory message from Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika.
					 The message said:
					
					 Availing myself of this happy occasion of greeting the centenary of the birth of HE President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, I would like to extend my heartfelt congratulations and best wishes for your good health and happiness as well as the friendly Korean people's progress and prosperity.
					
					 On this occasion, I would like to reaffirm my full will to join you in boosting the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between our two countries.
					
					 Please accept, Your Excellency, my highest regard.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Maldives
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Maldives
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un on April 1 received a congratulatory message from Mohammed Waheed Hassan, president of Maldives.
					 The message said:
					
					  I would like to send , on behalf of the government and people of Maldives and on my own behalf, warm salute and best wishes to Your Excellency and the government and people of the DPRK on the auspicious occasion of the birth anniversary of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Please accept, Your Excellency, my best wishes for your good health and the DPRK's progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Friday received a letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) as regards the holding of General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and his election as first chairman of the NDC.
					 It said:
					
					 The holding of Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal chairman of the NDC reflects the unshakable conviction and will of the service personnel and people in the north to preserve and glorify the exploits performed by him in the nation-building in the era of Songun forever as he put the dignity and might of socialist Korea on the highest level under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The revolutionary feats Kim Jong Il performed by leading the army and people in the north as the NDC chairman will last forever along with the development of Songun Korea and the victorious advance of the cause of global independence.
					
					 Your election to the top post of the DPRK helps cement its state system with the NDC, the eternal heritage bequeathed by Kim Jong Il, as its mainstay and give fuller play to the might of the Songun politics, thus providing a sure guarantee for the rosy future of a reunified prosperous nation where all compatriots will be able to enjoy a happy life generation after generation.
					
					 You are the top leader of the nation and a great lodestar of national reunification whom all the Koreans wholeheartedly held in high esteem, the letter noted, and continued:
					
					 It is the greatest privilege and fortune for all Koreans that you were elected to the top post of the DPRK as you have made an immortal contribution to ensuring the national security and world peace and accomplishment of the human cause of independence by pursuing the Songun politics.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Friday on holding General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and on his election as first chairman of the NDC.
					 The letter said that holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal chairman of the NDC of the DPRK is an expression of  a strong sense of moral obligation by the people in the homeland to glorify his immortal exploits forever.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The election of Kim Jong Un to the top post of the DPRK represents the highest honor for all the Korean people as it signifies the successful realization of their unanimous aspiration and wishes and a great event in the history of the nation as it makes it possible to glorify forever the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in the nation-building and immortal leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il along with the prosperous homeland.
					
					 Kim Jong Un represents the life and future of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and is their tender-hearted father, the letter stressed.
					
					 It evinced the resolution of the Koreans in Japan to single-mindedly unite around Kim Jong Un and usher in a new heyday of Chongryon as instructed by Kim Jong Il, cherishing the great national pride and self-esteem of having been blessed with the President and the leader generation after generation.
					
					  We will make a tangible contribution to the building of a thriving nation in the homeland, dynamically wage the movement for national reunification and further intensify the external activities to improve the DPRK-Japan relations, concluded the letter.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Family
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Family
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the visiting family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Saturday, a day before the 100th anniversary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from Ugandan President, Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from Ugandan President, Foreign Political Parties 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda and chairman of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, and the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, the Czechoslovak Communist Party and the C.C., Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in celebration of the centenary of the birth of the President. 
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues on Mansu Hill on Saturday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Chinese Institution
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Chinese Institution
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the China Foreign Languages Press Publishing and Distribution Administration on the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Zhou Mingwei, director of the Administration, handed it to Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Saturday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Government
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Government
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the Chinese government on his election as first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 It was handed to an official concerned Saturday by a minister of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 A floral basket presented to Kim Jong Un in the name of the embassy was also conveyed to the official.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Placed before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Placed before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Oceanic Regional Preparatory Committee, the Indonesian and Philippine Preparatory Committees to Celebrate the Centenary of the Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Choson Exchange Association in Singapore sent floral baskets to be placed before the statues of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il to mark the centenary of the birth of the President.
					 The floral baskets were laid before their statues on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					
					 On the same day floral baskets were laid by a Chinese delegation of Jilin Yuwen High School, George Burchett, son of Australian writer and journalist Wilfred Burchett.

articles.title: Erection of Kim Jong Il's Statue Represents DPRK People's Ardent Wish
articles.content:
rection of Kim Jong Il's Statue Represents DPRK People's Ardent Wish
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il were wonderfully erected on Mansu Hill in the capital city of Pyongyang to realize the ardent desire of all the Korean people.
					 It is high honor and pride of the DPRK to have built the statues at the historic time seeing the start of a new century of Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 An officer of the Korean People's Army, Ham Chol Hyon, told KCNA:
					
					 "I felt great happiness and deep emotion to see the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together, who bestowed all glory and honor on the people.
					
					 With the erection of the statues, we and our posterity can keep the images of the great men more deeply in hearts."
					
					 Han Chol Ryong, a teacher at Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, said:
					
					 "I told the statues that the dear respected Kim Jong Un was elected to the top post of the party and the state.
					
					 I will devote my all to accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un."
					
					 Hong Sun Jo, a citizen residing in Central District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "As we live in an apartment near Mansu Hill, my family feels higher pride than others. We are very happy to see the images of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il every time and every day."

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is celebrating President Kim Il Sung's 100th birth anniversary (April 15), the Day of the Sun, as one of the greatest national holidays.
					 A ceremony of unveiling statues of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill was held with splendor on Friday.
					
					 The erection is the highest pride of Songun Korea.
					
					 Mosaics picturing smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were erected on Jangdae Hill in Pyongyang.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out "The Great Man", Vol. 5 of "Comrade Kim Il Sung, Peerlessly Great Man."
					
					 The book serves as an encyclopedia, which systemizes in an all-round way Kim Il Sung's greatness in ideology, leadership and virtues. 
					
					 The government minted commemorative coins in honor of the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung and the State Stamp Bureau issued new stamps portraying his feats.
					
					 The celebrations include a national photo exhibition, state book exhibition, film show week, national fine art festival, state fine art exhibition, state industrial art exhibition and Songhwa fine art exhibition. 
					
					 A gathering took place by workers and members of trade unions in front of the old home of Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae, while colorful events and art performances were arranged in the run-up to the anniversary.
					
					 Conspicuous among them is the 14th Kimilsungia Festival now under way in Pyongyang. On display at the festival are more than 30 000 potted Kimilsungias presented by government-level agencies, servicepersons and civilians, overseas Koreans and foreigners.
					
					 Meanwhile, the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival is going on in Pyongyang in commemoration of the anniversary, participated in by foreign and overseas Korean artistes as well as artistes of the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Students Acclaimed at Art Festival
articles.content:
Russian Students Acclaimed at Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A performance by the Chorus Troupe of the Moscow Tchaikovsky State Conservatory of Russia participating in the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre. 
					 The chorus, made up of students, sang Korean songs very well.
					
					Korean songs "Nostalgia" and "The Blue Sky over My Country" were among attractions.
					
					 Kulikov Alexandr Dmitriyevich, a pianist of the troupe, told KCNA:
					
					 "All Korean songs lively represent sentiments and rendition should also represent the same sentiments.
					
					 Songs of Korea and Russia are somewhat in common with musical feelings. That is why the Korean songs are also easy to play for me."
					
					 Founded in 1923, the chorus troupe has participated in the festival from 2003 and was awarded the festival prize several times.
					
					 Its head, Stanislav Semyonovich Kalinin, dean of the Conservatory's Conducting Faculty, is well known among Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Comradeship Boundless
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Comradeship Boundless
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime forged comradely relations with many foreigners.
					 Among them was Zhang Weihua, an anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr of China. A son of a rich man, he gave sincere assistance to Kim Il Sung in his revolutionary activities. Fascinated by his great personality, he respected the President as a close friend as well as a teacher.
					
					 The President had a memorial to martyr Zhang Weihua built in Fusong, China, in 1992.
					
					 He also treated former Chilean President Salvador Allende Gossens with comradely love.
					
					 At the talks with Allende Gossens visiting the DPRK in the spring of 1969 as incumbent Senate president, Kim Il Sung called him his comrade-in-arms. Deeply moved, Allende evinced his determination to struggle for revolution to the last.
					
					 Afterwards, as the Chilean president, Allende enforced the land reform and nationalization of major industries and took hard-line independent measures against the United States, true to the promise he made with Kim Il Sung.
					
					 When Kim Il Sung heard of his death, he highly appreciated him for his heroic deed.
					
					 There was no frontier in the President's comradeship.

articles.title: Korean People, Joyful at Kim Jong Un's Election as NDC First Chairman
articles.content:
Korean People, Joyful at Kim Jong Un's Election as NDC First Chairman
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The news that the dear respected Kim Jong Un was elected first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK at the 5th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly has driven the people throughout the country to an ecstasy of joy.
					 A department director of the Ministry of Mining Industry, Kim Jong Hun, told KCNA:
					
					 "Kim Jong Un's election as NDC first chairman is the greatest fortune of the Korean people.
					
					 Always finding himself together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il in guiding the Songun (military-first) revolution, he made distinguished contributions to bolstering the Korean People's Army and developing the ammunitions industry."
					
					 Cha Yong Je, a section chief of the Ministry of Culture, said:
					
					 "The Korean people have keenly felt that Kim Jong Un is, indeed, the great leader of the DPRK.
					
					 With lofty fidelity and strong sense of moral obligation, he has wisely guided the work of perpetuating the memory of Kim Jong Il. He is also inspiring all the people to build a thriving nation while defending the country by dint of Songun."

articles.title: Korean People, Delighted at Kim Jong Un's Election as NDC First Chairman
articles.content:
Korean People, Delighted at Kim Jong Un's Election as NDC First Chairman
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Fifth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea elected the dear respected Kim Jong Un as first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC).
					 The election has greatly delighted the people throughout the country.
					
					 Jong Ki Yong, a worker of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, told KCNA: 
					
					 "Kim Jong Un's election as NDC first chairman is another great fortune of the Korean people. We are blessed with great leaders generation after generation."
					
					 Kim Jong Hwa, a teacher of Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 "The election represents the deepest trust of all the Korean people in Kim Jong Un. Thanks to his energetic Songun leadership, the DPRK is dynamically advancing along the road of victory.
					
					 No force in the world can match the strength of the Korean people closely rallied around him."

articles.title: DPRK People in Great Joy
articles.content:
DPRK People in Great Joy
 Pyongyang, April, 14 (KCNA) -- The Fifth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea declared that the DPRK would hold General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal chairman of its National Defence Commission (NDC).
					 Upon hearing the news, Ri Ui Gu, vice-president of the State Academy of Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 "To hold leader Kim Jong Il, a distinguished elder statesman and great saint, in high esteem as eternal chairman of the NDC is the highest glory for Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a socialist country centered on the popular masses with invincible might by successfully applying the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea in state building and activities."
					
					 Pak Thae Gu, an officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, said:
					
					 "With his unique Songun politics, Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a military power, smashing the vicious moves of the U.S.-led imperialist forces to stifle the DPRK and defending the Korean-style socialism with credit.
					
					 In a word, he was a peerless patriot and defender of socialist Korea.
					
					 With Kim Jong Il held in high esteem as the eternal leader of the WPK and the Korean revolution, we will work harder to glorify his revolutionary exploits."

articles.title: Impressive Performance by Italy's Female Trio at Art Festival
articles.content:
Impressive Performance by Italy's Female Trio at Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The performance by the Italian "Appassionante" Female Trio is drawing attention at the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival under way in Pyongyang.
					 The Trio put on the festival stage Korean song "General on a Galloping White Horse" and world famous musical pieces, including "Oh, My Sun", to be applauded by the audience.
					
					 It, made up of three female singers and one male pianist, is an experienced art troupe, well known to many countries for its peculiar performance tours.
					
					 The troupe got high appreciation at the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival held in 2009.
					
					 Stefania Francabandiwrca, a woman singer of the Trio, told KCNA: 
					
					 "I got deep impression from the past festival.
					
					  It is my honor to attend this excellent festival again. In Pyongyang I have felt how deeply the Korean people revere their leaders and how close the relations between the leader and the people are.
					
					  We are pleased to see the Korean people enjoy with keen interest and highly appreciate our performance."

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Life Woven with Songs
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Life Woven with Songs
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Nowadays, the songs President Kim Il Sung loved to sing in his lifetime are heard or aired at theatres and cinemas and on TV of the DPRK in commemoration of the centenary of his birth.
					 Listening to those songs, the Korean people recollect his brilliant career as a great revolutionary.
					
					 Kim Il Sung grew up to be a revolutionary, listening to "A Lullaby" sung by his mother and singing "Song of Devotion" and "Song of Advance" taught by his father.
					
					 When he crossed the River Amnok at the age of 14, he made his mind not to return home unless he won the independence of Korea, singing "Song of the River Amnok."
					
					 In the 1920s, he composed "Song of Korea", which calls for struggle to liberate the beautiful country from the Japanese aggressors.
					
					 Composing and singing patriotic and appealing songs, the President hardened his confidence in sure victory of the revolution, led the wars against the two imperialisms, Japanese and U.S., to victory and provided the Korean people with a happy life and rosy future.
					
					 Typical of the songs are "Song of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army", "Nostalgia", "Song of Anti-Japanese War", "Song of the Ten-Point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland", "May, Month of Victory", "Song of Plowing", "We Are the Happiest in the World", "Ballad of Phyongbuk Nyongbyon" and "A Bumper Harvest in the Chongsan Plain".

articles.title: Priority Given to People's Convenience
articles.content:
Priority Given to People's Convenience
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung devoted all his life to the people's happiness.
					 With clear-cut outlook on the people from his early days of revolutionary activities, he placed the people's interests above anything else.
					
					 In December Juche 62 (1973), the President climbed snow-covered Namsan Hill in the city of Pyongyang together with officials. Commanding a bird's-eye view of the city, he suggested building a library on the hill to be used by all people.
					
					 Therefore, the site was left intact for years and was offered for building a big library in the 1980s. When its building was finished, the President named the library the Grand People's Study House.
					
					 When the Pyongyang City was flooded in 1967, he acquainted himself with the situation in flood-hit areas with wireless apparatuses.
					
					He guided embankment improvement projects on the spot and went round flooded factories to take measures to recover from the damage as early as possible.
					
					 Flood damage went off in a short period and thousands of housing units with central heating system were built, afterwards.
					
					 With the approach of the Day of the Sun, the Korean people recollect the tireless efforts made by the President for their wellbeing and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (28)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (28)
DPRK Guided by Songun (Military-first) Politics
					
					 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung passed away on July 8, 1994.
					
					 After his death, the U.S.-led imperialist forces had intensified economic sanctions upon the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in a bid to stifle it.
					
					 The world's socialist market went away and flood, hurricane and drought hit the country year after year, forcing the DPRK to undergo economic hardships.  
					
					 At this crucial juncture, General Secretary Kim Jong Il opted for the Songun politics, a new mode of politics, to tide over the prevailing difficulties. 
					
					 The First Session of the 10th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, held in September Juche 87 (1998), approved the revised DPRK Socialist Law, which prioritizes the position and function of the National Defence Commission in the state's political life.   
					
					 The session reelected Kim Jong Il as NDC chairman, the top state post, and the nation's political system turned into an army-priority one. 
					
					 He began Songun politics with an inspection tour of the Tabaksol military post in January 1995. 
					
					 In the year 1996 alone, he made inspection tours of army units covering more than 10 000 kilometers. In five to six years after the President's demise, his tour of army units extended at least 56 000 kilometers. 
					
					 Thanks to his energetic efforts, the Korean People's Army had developed into an army, strong in politics, with latest military hardware.
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit, created by the KPA, had swept throughout the country, resulting in enormous achievements in all domains of society. 
					
					 By dint of the Songun politics, he won one victory after another in politico-ideological and military standoff with imperialists, thus defending the dignity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in at Least 170 Countries, Regions
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in at Least 170 Countries, Regions 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- This year marks the 15th anniversary of the institution of April 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, as the Day of the Sun in the DPRK.
					 In this period at least 9,500 colorful political and cultural events took place in more than 170 countries and regions and over 3,000 foreign media gave wide publicity to the Day of the Sun.
					
					 On the occasion of the first Day of the Sun preparatory committees made up of high-ranking government officials and political party leaders were formed in different countries. Resolutions, appeals and statements were issued one after another to greet this day as traditional international holiday and great festival common to mankind.
					
					 Party, state and government heads and figures of various circles of many countries sent floral baskets to DPRK missions in token of their tribute to the President.
					
					 At least 1,000 colorful events took place in more than 80 countries.
					
					 The great men of Mt. Paektu were presented with personal letters and gifts by heads of state, political party leaders, heads of governments, organizations, institutions, international organizations and individuals of different countries.
					
					 Foreign media gave wider publicity to the tenth Day of the Sun in April than ever before.
					
					 Book "Greatest Man" was published in Democratic Congo and bulletins were issued by political parties and organizations of Bulgaria, Denmark, Italy, UK, Brazil, the U.S. and Egypt.
					
					 News agencies, newspapers, broadcasting services, magazines and Internet websites of foreign countries carried special write-ups with portraits and photos of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and televisions showed Korean films.
					
					 Brisk preparations were made worldwide to significantly greet the Day of the Sun this year.
					
					 Prominent figures of governments, political parties, organizations and institutions of various countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions day by day and political parties, organizations and figures of various circles issued statements in the run-up to the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included meetings, book and photo exhibitions, film shows in Mongolia, Benin, Sweden, Laos, Nepal and Pakistan between April 3 and 7.
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin said the President was the father of the nation-building who built the DPRK into the country for people and developed it into a socialist power standing unfazed in any storm and stress for the first time in the national history spanning 5 000 years. 
					
					 The chairman of the Lao-DPRK Friendship Association said President Kim Il Sung was an outstanding leader who defeated U.S. imperialism for the first time in history by wisely leading the Korean people.
					
					 The minister of Commerce and Supplies of the Nepalese government said the President would always be alive in the hearts of all the peoples as he founded the Juche idea and wisely led the struggle of progressive humankind for independence.
					
					 The secretary general of the Punjab Provincial Committee of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan and the chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan and other speakers lauded the President for devoting his all to the country and its people and global independence.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked by Organizations of Ethiopia, Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked by Organizations of Ethiopia, Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Ethiopia and Democratic Congo issued bulletins to mark the Day of the Sun.
					 The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea in its bulletin on April 3 carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, holding high the banner of independence" with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The President performed undying exploits on behalf of the era and history under the uplifted banner of independence, the article said, and went on:
					
					 He worked heart and soul for global independence all his life and led the developing countries to build independent states firmly adhering to the principle of independence.
					
					 The banner of independence upheld by the President is encouraging the Korean people and the world progressive people.
					
					 The preparatory committee for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung in its bulletin on April 4 under the bannerline title "Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be alive in the hearts of the world progressive people" edited articles titled "Founder of the Juche idea", "Father of socialist Korea", "A life dedicated to the country's reunification" and "Great man recognized by the world".
					
					 The bulletin praised the feats he performed for national liberation, victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the nation-building. 
					
					 The President met many heads of state of various countries and political and public figures, the bulletin said, adding he was a great man recognized by the world.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures, Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures, Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The feats of President Kim Il Sung were praised by foreign figures and organizations.
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, in a statement on April 6 said that the life of the President who devoted himself to the freedom and happiness of the people and global independence is always remembered by the people of Democratic Congo. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President founded the immortal Juche idea in his early years, providing the world revolutionary people with a weapon of struggle and treasured sword for victory.
					
					 The world progressive people can win one victory after another only when they follow the revolutionary idea of the President and apply it into their actual conditions.
					
					 Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian－Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, in a statement on the same day extended glory to the President who indicated the way for the Korean people and the progressive people to follow in their struggle  and made immortal contributions to global independence.
					
					 The secretary general of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar in a statement on April 3 noted that it is thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, successor to the idea and cause of the President, that the DPRK has turned into an indestructible political and ideological power which has achieved the single-minded unity and a nuclear weapons state and a military power which no enemy dares provoke.
					
					 The secretary general expressed full support and solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving nation and reunify the country.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on April 2 noted that a century since the birth of the President was a history of victory and glory and a history of unprecedented advance for the Korean people, adding that he would always be alive in the hearts of mankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Works Off Press in Britain and Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Works Off Press in Britain and Myanmar
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's works "Let Us Uphold Independence" and "On the Five-Point Policy for National Reunification" were published in pamphlet by publishing houses of Britain and Myanmar.
					 The first work, published on Sept. 7, 1981, clarifies that it is required by the present era to maintain independence in party and state activities and the Juche idea is a man-centered philosophy.
					
					 The second work, published on June 25, 1973, clarifies the contents, significance and validity of the said policy.
					
					 The policy calls for defusing the military confrontation and tensions between the north and the south, realizing many-sided cooperation and interchange between them, convening the Great National Congress composed of representatives of the people from all walks of life and representatives of political parties and social organizations in the north and the south and establishing a north-south federation under a single national nomenclature. 
					
					 Book releasing ceremonies were held on April 6. 
					
					 Meanwhile, Iranian newspaper Iran News on April 8 carried the full text of Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation".
					
					 The work, published on August 1, 1991, clarifies the idea that the Korean nation is responsible for the country's reunification and indicates tasks for achieving the great unity of the entire nation and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was published in pamphlet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia.
					 The work, published on January 29, 2003, clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army, and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflects the requirements of the times and the revolution.
					
					 It also deals with the validity, advantages and great vitality of Songun politics.

articles.title: Acto central por el centenario del natalicio de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Acto central por el centenario del natalicio de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este sabado con solemnidad en el capitalino Estadio    Kim Il Sung el acto central en celebracion del centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					Asistio a la ocasion Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del PTC y el pueblo coreano. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los heroes, los familiares de martires revolucionarios, los hombres recibidos por el Presidente, los benemeritos, los trabajadores capitalinos, los compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y representantes de organizaciones internacionales, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, los participantes en el Congreso Mundial sobre la Idea Juche y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung fue el mas destacado lider de la revolucion y gran hombre sin igual acogido por primera vez en la historia de varios milenios de la nacion coreana, comenzo el informante y enumero sus imborrables proezas: 
					
					El Presidente creo el modelo mundial de la revolucion y construccion al levantar el socialismo centrado en las masas populares. 
					
					No escatimo nada para el pueblo y dispenso grandes benevolencias a todo el mundo practicando la politica abarcadora y la de beneficios populares.
					
					Presento los justos y racionales proyectos de reunificacion como los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, el Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo y el Programa de Diez Puntos de la Gran Unidad Pannacional, abrio nueva coyuntura de la gran unidad nacional y desarrollo el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria como una campana pannacional. 
					
					Planteo la destacada idea, la estrategia y tacticas sobre la verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero e hizo gran aporte a la unidad del movimiento socialista y el Movimiento de los Paises No Alineados y al desarrollo de la amistad y cooperacion entre los paises aspirantes a la independencia. 
					
					La idea y la causa de Kim Il Sung tuvieron firme continuidad gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien como camarada mas intimo y companero de armas mas fiel al Presidente, condujo sabiamente la sagrada lucha por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					En el periodo de la marcha penosa, la forzada, cuando se vio amenazado gravemente el destino de la patria y nacion, el Dirigente levanto al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea entristecidos por el gran duelo nacional y abrio la brecha de prosperidad de la patria superando al frente duras penas. 
					
					Formulo como Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria las lineas y proyectos independientes por la reunificacion de la patria, presentados por el Presidente, y allano la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio que avanza con el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					Impulso el movimiento socialista con su extraordinaria estrategia diplomatica y energicas actividades exteriores e hizo gran contribucion a la paz y la estabilidad del mundo y al cumplimiento de la causa antiimperialista por la independencia. 
					
					Por tener al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, General Insigne sin igual, en el supremo cargo del partido y la revolucion, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea estan llenos de conviccion y optimismo y es prometedor el futuro de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El mismo dia, tuvieron lugar actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades, distritos y complejos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ordena elevar grados militares de comandantes del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ordena elevar grados militares de comandantes del EPC
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Jong Un emitio el dia 13 la orden no.009 sobre la elevacion de grados militares de los comandantes del EPC.
					En su orden, el Comandante Supremo senalo que las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea, fundadas y conducidas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung al camino de victorias y glorias y fortalecidas como invencible ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, realizaron inmortales proezas ante el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo durante 80 anos desde su fundacion continuando su gloriosa tradicion de defensa al lider a costa de la vida.
					
					Hoy tambien ellas demuestran su invencible poderio en la defensa de la patria y la construccion de un Estado prospero, recalco.
					
					Convencido de que los comandantes del EPC, crecidos bajo la guia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Lider como pilares de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, cumpliran con su deber de vanguardia de la revolucion del Songun en la sagrada lucha por llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche en pleno acato al legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el ordeno ascender sus grados militares con motivo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Segun la orden, Pak Sun Hwan recibio el grado de teniente general y Kim Yong Hwa, Son Kyong Bok y otros 68 se hicieron generales de brigada.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con huespedes extranjeros
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con huespedes extranjeros
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 14 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con Vishwanath, secretario general del Consejo del Premio Internacional      Kim Il Sung y director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Kenichi Ogami, secretario general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, y su comitiva, Johnny Hon, Presidente de la Fundacion Internacional Kim Il Sung y su comitiva, las delegaciones y delegados de las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche de varios paises y regiones que participaron en el Congreso Mundial sobre la Idea Juche.

articles.title: Entidades chinas donan materiales a RPDC
articles.content:
Entidades chinas donan materiales a RPDC 
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de Amistad del Pueblo Chino con el Extranjero y la Asociacion de Amistad China-Corea donaron materiales que serviran para acondicionar bien la zona periferica de las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la colina Mansu. 
					Tuvo lugar el dia 14 la ceremonia de donacion. 
					
					Antes de la ceremonia, los miembros de la delegacion china encabezada por el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad China-Corea, Wu Donghe, rindieron homenaje al Presidente y al Dirigente tras depositar un cesto de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce. 
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los miembros de dicha delegacion, el vicepresidente del CC de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-China y del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jin Bom, y otros funcionarios coreanos. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos y fue trasladado el certificado de donacion.

articles.title: Ofrecido banquete en honor de los adeptos a la idea Juche
articles.content:
Ofrecido banquete en honor de los adeptos a la idea Juche
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 14 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo un banquete en honor de los participantes en el Congreso Mundial sobre la Idea Juche.
					Entre los invitados se distinguian Vishwanath, secretario general del Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Il Sung y director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche (IIIJ), Kenichi Ogami, secretario general del IIIJ, y otros participantes en el Congreso.
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Ki Nam, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente de la Asociacion Coreana de Cientificos Sociales, Kim Yong Il, secretario del CC del PTC, Pak Ui Chun, ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Jong Suk, presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, y otros funcionarios.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam quien senalo que el Congreso Mundial sobre la Idea Juche fue un gran festival politico que recordo las hazanas del Presidente y demostro una vez mas a todo el mundo la justeza y la vitalidad de la idea Juche.
					
					Agrego que hoy dia, la idea Juche, concebida por el Presidente y profundizada y desarrollada por el Dirigente, sigue esparciendo sus brillos como gran idea directriz de la epoca de independencia gracias a al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un sobre la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Deseo mayores exitos en las labores de los adeptos a la idea Juche que se esfuerzan por construir un nuevo mundo independiente y envian apoyo y solidaridad a la justa causa del pueblo coreano.
					
					Vishwanath subrayo en su discurso que la solemne celebracion del citado Congreso Mundial es una expresion de veneracion infinita hacia el Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					El menciono que hoy tambien, el Presidente y el Dirigente orientan el camino a seguir por los adeptos a la idea Juche y conducen la causa de verificacion de la independencia por la orbita de Juche.
					
					Recalco que gracias a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, estan garantizadas la continuacion y la coronacion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la de independencia de las masas populares.

articles.title: Rubricado plan de intercambio cultural Corea-Vietnam
articles.content:
Rubricado plan de intercambio cultural Corea-Vietnam 
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo suscrito el dia 14 en esta capital el plan de intercambio cultural para 2012-2014 entre el Ministerio de Cultura de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el Ministerio de Cultura, Deportes y Turismo de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam. 
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana, el viceministro de Cultura, Han Chol, y otros funcionarios, y por la vietnamita, la delegacion cultural gubernamental encabezada por el viceministro de Cultura, Deportes y Turismo, Ho Anh Tuan, y el ministro consejero de la sede diplomatica vietnamita en Corea, Nguyen Dinh Duong.
